comment: Wanting to control my screen. Seems it has the features, but I cannot load the track on Google maps and the time and distance and waypoints onto calendar

author: John Doe
comment: The free version has way too many ads!  The hud elements available such as the speedometer were great.   Would have liked more customization of the speedometer.   A smaller size matching the date/time stamp would have been perfect.   It wouldn't recognize a 64gb class 10 card I had installed but worked fine with a 16gb class 2 card.
title: Has potential but needs lots of work.

author: Stas Baskin
comment: Don't understand the overall average rating. I tried many apps in this category.. Many of the top rated fail. This one works great.
title: Works great where others fail

author: A Google User
comment: Since changing phone to Z2 this app has major problems for me. Main one being loss of picture quality. Very pixalated and out of focus. Sad as I used this app a lot.
title: Nick

author: Shaun Jay
comment: Nice app with features and idea, but ads pop-up every time changing screens. That's just too much. Uninstalling.

author: Lukas Kucera
comment: Maximum 15 mins. of recording is too short, the speedo and map is not being recorded together with the footage, apps freezes every now and then, cannot edit date & time.
title: Unistalled after few days

author: Florin Crisan
comment: First, I gave this app one star, because it used to crash on all of my three phones. Then the developer wrote me and asked me to turn on the GPS and the app will not crash, anymore. He was right; once I turned on the GPS, the app works fine. Still, I cannot give if five stars, because sometimes I don't want to use the GPS. The GPS markings in my footages have no relevance to me, so I would appreciate if I would have the chance of working with this software without turning on the GPS receiver. Until then, I'll give it four stars, with all my heart.

reply.author: Busy WWW
reply.content: Hi, there. Thanks for the report. With other user's crash report, find the reason why. The GPS was not turned on when the app was starting, and the error message function caused the problems. I will check and update the app asap. Please TURN ON the GPS before starting the app until bug fix update. Thanks.

title: Getting better

author: Jupiter Florida
comment: Not working on s3 after up  date

reply.author: Busy WWW
reply.content: Would you please uninstall and re-install the app again! As the settings options are changed, you may need to Reset the component display settings from the settings display section or from the main record form. Otherwise, please let me know with detailed app bug information for me through the email. Thanks

title: Not working

author: David Hancock
comment: It needs to keep recording with the screen off. My S3 gets about 40 minutes of record time, which could be extended if I could turn off the screen.  Recently began frame slippage and rotation. So the image displays and records with the frame rotating like a merry-go-round.
title: Generally good.
